SVGRadialGradientElementR.summary: The r read-only property of the interface describes the radius of the radial gradient as an . It reflects the computed value of the {{SVGAttr("r")}} attribute on the {{SVGElement("radialGradient")}} element.

remarks.para: The attribute value is a <length>, <percentage>, or <number>. The numeric value of the is the radius of the radial gradient in the user coordinate system.
